dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You stand before Thornhide, the mighty Forest Troll. Who dares intrude in our domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace seeking knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Knowledge? Ha! Weak words from a stranger. What brings you here, truly?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect the power of the Glacial Horde. I seek an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance? The Glacial Horde needs no alliances with weaklings. Leave now or face our wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave your domain, no harm intended.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Smart choice. The forest is unforgiving to those who overstep. Leave and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge Thornhide, the Forest Troll, to test my strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenger? Bold words, weakling. Prepare to be crushed by the might of the Glacial Horde!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. I did not mean to offend.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Yield? Cowardice has no place in these woods. You will learn respect through pain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight to prove my worth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. You will regret challenging Thornhide.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the wisdom of Thornhide, the Forest Troll.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Hah! Mortals and their foolish desires. Speak quickly, or leave our domain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies are meaningless. Begone before I lose my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stay and learn from Thornhide's wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool. You will regret seeking wisdom where you do not belong.
